components.name: DigitalClock
components.description: A component to display a digital clock with various formatting options, including 12/24 hour modes and seconds display, and an animated flip clock.

components.name: AnalogClock
components.description: A component to display an analog clock with customizable styles and options.

components.name: DateText
components.description: A component to display formatted date strings with various presets and customization options.
